data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Export Promotion Policy - 2020-25 - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides transport subsidy for exports routed through airports upto maximum of Rs.5 lakhs annually per unit.
data.eligibility: All existing manufacturers / producers involved in the export of goods or services are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Applicant's Average Annual Export Turnover of Rs.100 lakhs or more in the last 3 years. 

The exporter should not have any pending cases or debt due beyond 6 months.

The exporter should not be convicted under cases of Tax evasion or fraud.

Prompt in payment of Taxes by Self-Assessment and in depositing P.F. amounts.
data.beneficiaries: All existing manufacturers / producers involved in the export of goods or services are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Applicant's Average Annual Export Turnover of Rs.100 lakhs or more in the last 3 years. 

The exporter should not have any pending cases or debt due beyond 6 months.

The exporter should not be convicted under cases of Tax evasion or fraud.

Prompt in payment of Taxes by Self-Assessment and in depositing P.F. amounts.
data.context: Promulgated to establish Uttar Pradesh as the best export hub in the country by providing world class infrastructure and capacity building of concerned stakeholders through single window system and to explore new potential markets for existing and innovative products of the state by making best use of the stateâ€™s resources.
data.objective: Policy aims at boosting export sector competitiveness, supporting export bodies, enhancing infrastructure for increased state exports, aiding industry export capacities, identifying global market opportunities for local products, and fostering export-related best practices for capacity development.
data.description:
Scheme provides various incentives to exporters:

For compulsory certifications : Reimbursement of 50% of expenses subject to a maximum of Rs. 2 Lakh per unit per annum.

For transport subsidy : For exports routed through airports, transport subsidy of upto Rs. 5 lakhs annually per unit. 

Green Card : Applicant who hold this card will requires minimum inspection and speedy clearance of all proposals by all Departments.

Skill development training : Incentives equal to 75% of the training cost per participant.
data.how_to_apply: Eligible Candidate can apply through UP Nivesh Portal : https://invest.up.gov.in/nivesh-mitra-single-window-clearance/
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval from the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Certificate of Incorporation (for companies)
GST Registration Certificate
Import Export Code (IEC) from Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT)
Bank Details/Passbook (for subsidy or financial incentives)
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit and Loss Account)
Export Performance Data (for previous years)
Proof of Export Activities (shipping bills, export invoices, etc.)
Certificate from Chartered Accountant (for claims related to export turnover)
Self-Declaration of Export Turnover
Aadhaar Card/Identity Proof of the applicant
Electricity Bill/Proof of Electricity Consumption (for eligibility for electricity duty reimbursement)
Application Form (as prescribed by the relevant authority)
Tax Clearance Certificate (if applicable)
